mapping_subtitle: Match your Notion properties to Lark Base fields.
credential_manager_desc: Your credentials are saved locally in your browser using secure obfuscation. They are never sent to our servers and are used only to interact directly with Notion/Lark APIs.
lark_note: After saving App ID and App Secret, the system will automatically obtain tenant_access_token when needed.
name: Name
notion_tip: We use your saved Integration Token to access databases.
notion_config_first: Please configure your Notion Integration Token first.
share_db_hint: Share the database with your integration and paste its ID if list is empty.
no_databases: No databases found. Ensure the Notion integration has access.
lark_tip: We use your App ID & Secret to write to the Base.
lark_config_first: Please configure your Lark App ID and Secret first.
rename_notice: Please set a custom name in Settings for quick selection next time.
notion_config_tooltip: Notion Integration Token is created in Notion developer settings and shared to the database you want to access.
lark_config_tooltip: Feishu App ID and App Secret are from the developer console. They are used to obtain tenant_access_token for Bitable APIs.
saved_tables_tooltip: Saved tables let you quickly reuse Base Token and Table ID. You can edit the display name here.
lark_token_invalid: Base token not found or invalid
tenant_token_missing: Tenant token missing or expired. Please check App ID & Secret.
permission_denied: Permission denied. Ensure app is collaborator with edit access.
validate_failed: Failed to validate Base token or permissions
no_fields_found: No fields found in selected table
test_failed_no_permission: Base token validation failed or no permission
landing_subtitle: Quickly map fields and bulk import your Notion database records into Feishu/Lark Bitable with secure, local credential storage.
landing_step1: Open Settings and save your Notion token and Lark App ID & Secret.
landing_step2: Connect Notion database and select your Lark Base and table.
landing_step3: Map Notion properties to Lark fields with clear matching.
landing_step4: Choose import limit and run bulk import safely.
landing_feature_fast: Fast setup and clear step-by-step flow.
landing_feature_secure: Credentials are stored locally with secure obfuscation.
landing_feature_batch: High-volume batch create via official Bitable API.
paste_base_table_hint: Paste Base Token and Table ID, then click Add.
